exec: // Save to collection variables (works across all environments)

console.error("❌ No auth_token found in response");

request.description: Authenticates users and returns JWT tokens. Supports both email and username for login. Requires whitelabel_admin_uuid for multi-tenant support (not needed for superadmin login).

query.description: Searches username, email, project_name

request.description: Lists all companies with their project information. Superadmin only.
Creates a new company with associated WhiteLabelAdmin project. Automatically generates initial data for the company.

query.description: Search by username or email
Search by title, code, or game_category

request.description: Lists all games. Games are manually created and cannot be created via API.
Updates game details. Admins-only.
Checks the total balance across all user games for a specific game.
Queues creation of a game account and creates UserGames only when credentials succeed.
Deducts main balance, enqueues game top-up with bonus logic.
Returns game balance to main winning balance (with minimum thresholds if configured).
Rotates game password via provider and updates local record.
Fetches game balance for a user.
Admin variant supports checking others' game balance.
Store-level balance for a given game/provider.

query.description: Search by user__username, status, or type
processing (pending/failed) or history (completed/cancelled)
purchases or cashouts (takes priority over type)

request.description: Lists transactions. Use type=processing for pending/failed, type=history for completed/cancelled, txn=purchases for pending purchases, txn=cashouts for pending cashouts.

query.description: Shows transactions with status pending or failed
Shows transactions with status completed or cancelled
Shows pending purchase transactions only (excludes game transactions)
Shows pending cashout transactions only (excludes game transactions)

request.description: Cancel or complete a transaction. Form fields: txn_id, type in {cancel, complete}

query.description: processing, history, recharge_game, redeem_game, add_user_game

request.description: Lists transaction queues (game activities). Use type=processing for pending/failed, type=history for completed/cancelled.

query.description: Shows transaction queues with status pending or failed
Shows transaction queues with status completed or cancelled

request.description: Manual actions for game operations. retry re-queues the same Celery task; cancel marks cancelled and performs refunds/state rollbacks; complete marks success, optionally overrides new_password or new_balance.
Entries are pre-created for all games during initialization, so only updates are supported.
Only one transfer bonus entry per admin, so only updates are supported.
Only one signup bonus entry per admin, so only updates are supported.
Only one entry per admin, so only updates are supported.

query.description: Search by title, banner_type, or banner_category

request.description: Creates a new admin banner with separate images for web and mobile platforms. At least one banner image (web_banner, mobile_banner, or banner_thumbnail) must be provided.

query.description: Search by agent username or email

request.description: Lists all affiliate agents with their commission settings and financial statistics.
Updates commission settings for a specific affiliate agent. All percentage fields must be between 0 and 100.
Manually adds a player as an affiliate to an agent.
Lists all payment methods available for the authenticated user's project.
Superadmin only. Lists all companies for payment method management.
Superadmin only. Gets payment methods for a specific company.

query.description: Chatroom ID (or use user_id instead)

url.description: Get recent chat messages. Use chatroom_id OR user_id.

query.description: Player user ID (alternative to chatroom_id)
Chatroom ID (or use user_id instead)

url.description: Get purchase history for a chatroom. Use chatroom_id OR user_id.
Get list of online players in chat.
Get detailed player information including game activities and transactions.

query.description: Optional game ID to filter by specific game

url.description: Admin endpoint to check player game balances. Supports checking other users' balances.
Save or update notes for a player.
Update the minimum redeem multiplier for game redemptions.
Superadmin only. Lists all companies for offmarket game management.
Superadmin only. Gets offmarket games for a specific company.
Get invoice PDF or details for a transaction.

WebSocket endpoint for real-time processing notifications. Connect using WebSocket client (wss:// for HTTPS, ws:// for HTTP).

Example connection URL:
- HTTPS: wss://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/notifications/{username}/
- HTTP: ws://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/notifications/{username}/

Requires JWT authentication via query parameter or header.

query.description: Admin user ID

url.description:
WebSocket endpoint for real-time chat messages. Room name format: P{player_id}Chat

Example connection URL:
- HTTPS: wss://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/cschat/P123Chat/?user_id=1
- HTTP: ws://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/cschat/P123Chat/?user_id=1

Requires authentication.

query.description: Admin user ID

url.description:
WebSocket endpoint for real-time chat list updates (unread counts).

Example connection URL:
- HTTPS: wss://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/chatlist/?user_id=1
- HTTP: ws://admin.serverhub.biz/ws/chatlist/?user_id=1

Requires authentication.

Note: Postman doesn't support WebSocket connections directly. Use a WebSocket client like:
- Browser DevTools Console
- wscat (npm install -g wscat)
- Postman WebSocket support (if available)
- Custom WebSocket client
